nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 27. Southeast wind around 2 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow between 11am and noon, then rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 39. Southeast wind 2 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow before 7pm, then rain and snow showers between 7pm and 8pm, then snow. Cloudy, with a low around 29. Northeast wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 33. Northeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 2am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 25. North wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. Northeast wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely. Cloudy, with a low around 29. Northeast wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy, with a high near 33. North wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. Northwest wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 36. Northwest wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 18. West wind around 7 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow between 10am and 2pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38. Southwest wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 7pm, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 33. Southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 43. Southwest wind around 9 mph.
